summary: Nimble uses AI agents to search the web, verify and validate the results, and then clean and structure the information into neat tables that can then be queried like a database.

summary: While some dual investors are understandable, others were more shocking, and signal the disregard of a longstanding ethical conflict-of-interest rule.

title: Optical Fiber Prices Are Soaring on AI Demand
summary: Fiber manufacturing capacity has maxed out due to rise in AI and military drone sales, and prices are soaring.

title: Rethinking Data Center Energy Management as Demand Surges
summary: Rising AI and cloud workloads are pushing grid capacity limits. Integrating systems and optimizing energy use in real time is now essential.
